theme: Education for all,Education for the knowledge economy

abstracts.cdata!:
This is the Implementation Completion
            Report (ICR) for the Human Resources Development Sector
            Investment Loan (HRDSIL I ) to Jordan. The development
            objectives selected for the project were: (i) to raise the
            quality of basic and secondary education and to enhance
            student achievement levels; (ii) to use sector resources
            more efficiently; and  (iii) to develop institutional
            structures that would be responsive to the system's
            qualitative and quantitative needs over the long term. The
            key lessons to be learned from this project were: (a)
            education reform programs require a long-term strategy,
            continuing consensus among different stakeholders and
            government ownership; (b) technical institutions have a
            great potential to impact implementation; (c) fundamental
            policy change requires greater effort at consensus building
            which cannot be assumed a priori; (d) project implementation
            should respect technical standards; and (e) lending
            instruments must match objectives.
